commands.gamerule.snowrealmagic.hint: Snow! Real Magic! is installed, this game rule is ignored. Use configuration instead.
gamerule.snowrealmagic:blizzardFrequency: The possibility to do blizzard. N/10000 per tick per chunk. Added by Snow! Real Magic!
Snow blocks will fall from sky. 1~8 to set the max layers. Added by Snow! Real Magic!
snowrealmagic.config.accumulation.accumu: Snow layer accumulates during thundering. (There is no thundering in winter in Serene Seasons, so this option will be applicable to any raining weather.)
snowrealmagic.config.accumulation.maxLay: Maximum layers of snow that can accumulate. 9 is unlimited.
snowrealmagic.config.accumulation.natura: Snow melts with time if its layer is more than 1.
snowrealmagic.config.accumulation.smooth: Snow layer will accumulate and melt more smoothly.
snowrealmagic.config.accumulation.snowAn: Snow And Ice Melt In Warm Biomes
Snow and ice will melt in warm biomes.
snowrealmagic.config.fancySnowOnUpperSla: Snow layer on upper slab will render snow overlay on the side of the slab.
snowrealmagic.config.integration.accumul: If you have mod that adds seasons, snow accumulation only happens in winter.
snowrealmagic.config.mobSpawningMaxLayer: Maximum layers of snow for mobs to spawn.
snowrealmagic.config.particleThroughLeav: Generates snowflake particles under snow that is above leaves.
snowrealmagic.config.rightClickToggleFan: Right click with empty hands to toggle the fancy snow overlay on any snow layer.
snowrealmagic.config.sneakSnowball.desc: Sneak+use on snow layer to obtain snowball, consuming one layer of snow.
snowrealmagic.config.snow-cover.placeNat: Snow can be placed on some blocks not only by player, but also from snowfall or world generation.
snowrealmagic.config.snow-cover.placeSno: Snow can be placed on some blocks to make them snow-covered.
snowrealmagic.config.snow-cover.replaceW: Replace the vanilla world generation feature to also generate snow-covered blocks.
snowrealmagic.config.snow-cover.restoreO: If you want to uninstall this mod, you can restore snow-covered blocks to their original blocks on chunk loaded.
snowrealmagic.config.snowAlwaysReplaceab: Snow layer can always be placed by other blocks, as long as it is not full.
snowrealmagic.config.snowGravity.desc: Snow will fall down like sand.
snowrealmagic.config.snowMakingIce.desc: Falling snow becomes ice when it touches water.
snowrealmagic.config.snowPersistMaxLight: Maximum light level for snow to not melt.
snowrealmagic.config.snowReduceFallDamag: Reduce fall damage when landing on snow, depending on the snow layers.
snowrealmagic.config.snowSpawnMaxLightLe: Maximum light level for snow to spawn.
snowrealmagic.config.snowVariants.desc: Some snow-covered foliage will be rendered differently.
snowrealmagic.config.sustainGrassIfLayer: Sustain Grass If Layer More Than One
Prevents grass block from turning into dirt when snow layer is more than 1.
Shrink the collision box of the snow layer.
